title: End of an Era as Julian Alaphilippe Leaves Soudal Quick-Step: ‘It’s a Little Painful’
content:
‘He is 32 years old and now chooses the money,’ says Patrick Lefevere of Alaphilippe, as long relationship nears end.

Read the full article at End of an Era as Julian Alaphilippe Leaves Soudal Quick-Step: ‘It’s a Little Painful’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
